thread.section_title: Villa Beaumarchais - UPDATED 2016 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice Hotel at a reasonable price
thread.title_full: Nice Hotel at a reasonable price - Review of Villa Beaumarchais, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Zac66
title: Nice Hotel at a reasonable price
text:
I stayed at the Villa Beaumarchais Hotel at beginning novembre 2016. The Hotel is nice, clean, good position for Metro line 8 or Bus. Helpful Staff 24 hours. Breakfast OK but to be paid separately (maybe a little expensive).
Recommended for a short vacation in Paris Centre or for business in the City.
